text: Mme basadi bangwe, ka tumelo, ba amogela ba ga bone ba ba rategang, ba ba neng ba sule. Le fa go ntse jalo, bangwe ba ikanya Modimo, mme ba betswa go fitlhelela ba a swa. Ba itlhophela go swa go na le go furalela Modimo gore ba gololesege, ba tshepha gore ba tlaa tsogela botshelong jo bo botoka moragonyana.
